column2: "One of the weapons Hunters are really good with is the partizan."
"This weapon's known for its awesome reach, long point, and flashy combat style."
"The best way to learn how to use it is to dive in headfirst. No textbooks required!"
"It just so happens I have a spare halberd lying around. Take it and go practice a bit."
"Partizans are melee weapons that let you mow down enemies swiftly and with force."
"Try basic partizan attacks and photon arts for yourself. It is perfect for striking the enemy relentlessly, shifting from graceful moves to powerful attacks with finesse."
